post.body: well I know what an empanada IS. Just not sure what the mission entails...
against my better judgement, i kind of want to take it home and sleep next to it.
@gamingangel or we can all go get drinks after your meetings like we never did during E3. :)
@gamingangel and i will be there wed. night through sunday.
OMG we are going to tear it UP. what day are you in?
argh! the only one in jan i could possibly make is new year's -- are you even having a show that day? i leave for CES the 7th. :(
oh that looks nice. geek project for the weekend. thanks for the tip, i'll try it out.
@MikeWehner don't really want to snake a cable through the dining *and* living room. :(
i don't fly in until sat.! let me know when the next show after that is and i'll definitely try to make it.
well you'll go in with 1/3 probability of failing. are you willing to take those chances? g/l at show tonight!
how long are you in LA? i fly in next saturday. we did not get to hang out nearly enough at funde razor :)
gimme an hour or so - gotta rev the monday engine before i get into any serious stuff like zombie slaying.
i feel the same. i hung up on a friend who was trying to defend it the other day.
BUT WAT ABOUT HOME??? :P
i'm going to round up a chainsaw brigade and storm the castle. send me a text when the hammer's online.
do you think it's the games or the people who use 360 or ps3? or something else entirely?
@garnettlee NOT HAPPY.
have you seen Blowdry? alan rickman and bill nighy are dueling hairstylers. also, you get to see heidi klum's lady parts (!)
pics or it didn't happen!
holy hell you just got to ohio? Wouldn't it have been quicker to drive? Jeeebuz
btw, make sure you enter our left4dead contest! http://is.gd/bR3Z
mr. bossman greg says we have to go on an empanada mission. no clue what that means. @gamedaily, out!
clue to what we're giving away this friday on HOLICRAZE. http://i35.tinypic.com/2d7ykxg.jpg
dear california: haha, we stole your sunshine. 64Ëš in new york today.
hugh jackman is pretty much the perfect male specimen in every imaginable way. i'd watch him file taxes. allll night long. http://bit.ly/wlv
win a copy of left4dead for you AND for a friend (plus a ton of signed swag) -- enter today's HOLICRAZE contest! http://bit.ly/gd_hc
OH my god. 'walking with dinosaurs' is freakin intense. baby cynodont just got ATE. damn nature, you scary!
dilemma: either i go without xbox live for a month or i drop $99 for a wireless adapter i'll use for a month. or get a 50ft ethernet cable.
dear left4dead AI director: fuck you to death. loooooove, robin.
this is AFTER the tv and lights went out while I was playing a session of left 4 dead, mind you. i feel like a real man now.
holy hell i should get a medal -- just went out into the cold, dark december night to reset a fuse armed only with a flashlight.
Revelation: momma puts all gifts inside larger boxes to prevent curious shakers and size-analyzers. Namely, me :)
Sister picked up a copy of Watchmen for me on way back from Santa Monica. Nerding it up! :)
can't be productive on one small laptop screen when i usually have a second monitor and another iMac to work on. LIFE IS SO HARDDD.
also, realized during the non-connected times that the 360 is kind of no fun without friends. l4d, gears, keflings just felt ... empty.
snaked a 50ft cable through the house to connect my 360 -- almost tripped a few times but worth the netflix instant-watch.
Monday. Time to start making the most of vacation hours by sitting in front of the monitor... like when I'm not on vacation. Waheee!
Dad says gift shopping for me is super easy- anything with lights, buttons and/or a big screen. SO TRUE.
Finally awake. Hey LA- running errands and being lazy today. Tomorrow, we begin the festivities and reunions. :)
LA, I missed you. Parents and sister picking me up. Safe travels everyone, and good night!
